channel.title: Markets on Random

item.title: More Books on Markets
item.description: Interesting books on markets from FT FT Opinion on Time Warner Inc | Observer US | 11 October 2005 “In life and in business, there are two cardinal sins,” Icahn wrote. “The first is to act precipitously without thought, and the second is to not act at all.” by Carl Icahn. The World for Sale: Money, Power and the Traders Who Barter the Earth’s Resources (2022) by Javier Blas and Jack Farchy | Link
